MonsterHutch.name: Monster Hutch
MonsterHutch.description: A secure building for raising dangerous monsters.
MonsterHutchExpanded.name: Monster Hutch Basement
MonsterHutchExpanded.description: Adds a basement to your monster hutch. Monsters cannot go down the stairs but casks will work there.
ConfigHutchExpansionDescription: Whether to add a Monster Hutch upgrade that adds a basement.
ConfigReplaceHutchInteriorDescription: Whether to double size of hutch interior to accommodate more monsters
ConfigRandomizeMonsterPositions:
Randomize Monster Position
In Hutch Daily
ConfigRandomizeMonsterPositionsDescripti: Randomizes the position of all monsters in the hutch, so they are not clumped up
ConfigSkipRandomizeSlimePositions:
Randomize Monster Position 
Does Not Affect Slimes
ConfigIncubatorIsAffectedByCoopmasterDes: Whether coopmaster profession cuts the incubation time in half (like with slime incubator)
ConfigIncubatorAdditionalRequiredItemIDD: The item ID that also gets consumed as fuel by the incubator in addition to the monster item (default: void essence)
ConfigIncubatorAdditionalRequiredItemCou: Number of above item that is consumed; if less than 1, the above item is no longer required (default: 10)
ConfigIncubatorRecipeDescription: The crafting recipe for the monster incubator
ConfigIncubatorRecipeUnlockDescription: The unlock condition for the monster incubator recipe
MonsterIncubator.name: Monster Incubator
MonsterIncubator.description: Creates a variety of monsters based on the input item. Does not work outside a hutch!
MonsterIncubator.InputWarning: Not a valid input for incubation
WizardLetter.content: @,^^   I know I can trust you with the blueprints for my latest invention, the 'Monster Incubator'. It recreates and revivifies monsters from their component parts by harnessing the arcane energy of Void Essence. As a safety measure, it only works in a 'Monster Hutch'.^^   -M. Rasmodius, Wizard
MonsterIncubator.instructions:
-~-Monster Incubator Guide-~-

    The Monster Incubator reanimates monsters from one of their component parts, consuming 10 Void Essence to power the transformation. As a safety measure, I designed it to only function within a 'Monster Hutch'.

 Successful reanimation subjects:
 *1 Mummified Bat -> Living Bat
 *10 Coal -> Dust Sprite
 10 Bug Meat -> Spider
 *10 Cinder Shard -> Magma Sprite
 *10 Ore -> Rock Crab
 *1 Truffle -> Truffle Crab
 *1 Ginger -> Stick Bug
ConfigLethalRingsDescription: Whether wearing a charmer ring allows you to deal damage to the relevant monster
